content: I have never heard of any such thing, ma'am. If that were true, it would be well known and touted throughout the circles. But I'm just a dumb enlisted grunt, so if the military officers have a different version, go with them. To us, a "military ball" is a 12-pack of beer, a bottle of Jack and a buffer to play cowboy on. Refined we ain't. It's not that there is no God or that He isn't listening. You're probably just asking the wrong questions.
